VERY Negative Experience with Gladys Care 1987 (Gladys Care)

My wife and I engaged Gladys Care 1987 (Gladys Care) for a confinement nanny in August 2023. We paid half of the agreed sum as a deposit. We informed the agency of our baby's expected delivery date (EDD) of March 20, 2024, and as per the contract, the nanny was supposed to be on standby one week prior to this date.

Upon admission to the hospital on March 20, 2024, at 4:30 PM, we promptly informed the agency of our imminent delivery. Our baby was born on March 21, 2024. However, the nanny only arrived on March 23, 2024, which was two days late. While we reluctantly accepted this delay, it was contractually unacceptable. The nanny was supposed to be on standby in Singapore, not in Malaysia, as the delay resulted in an extra night at the hospital.

During her tenure, the nanny’s service was causing worry, with her falling asleep during night shifts, causing distress to my wife. Despite these issues, we chose not to complain and worked directly with the nanny to ensure she got enough rest. (However, she is nice person and got along really well with us. She cooks well too and genuinely care for our baby! Shoutout to nanny Juliana, the one star i left on this review is for her!)

As the nanny’s term was ending on April 19, 2024, a conflict arose. The agency was demanding the remaining deposit, and we requested a discussion for a discount due to the nanny's late arrival. We held back the payment but never displayed any intent of not paying.

On the last day of the nanny's service, we were hosting a party at 7 PM to celebrate our baby’s full month. The nanny, whose shift was to end at 12 PM, informed the agency she would stay for the party and return afterward.

Meanwhile, we tried to reach the agency for a compromise on the fees, but Gladys did not respond.

At 6 PM, Gladys came to our unit, behaving rudely and accusing us of forcibly holding back the nanny and refusing to pay. Instead of engaging in an amicable discussion, she shouted at us and even involved the police, claiming it was her professional duty to ensure the baby was fine.

However, after the police left, no further checks were made on the baby, contrary to her assertion. Her actions ruined our party.

The police, after hearing both sides, found her unreasonable and acknowledged that she did not follow the contractual agreement. Although we paid the remaining deposit as she refused to negotiate, the police affirmed that we had the right to write a review or make a complaint to CASE.

Despite the distress caused by Gladys, we initially chose to let it go. However, we later discovered she had deliberately informed us late about the nanny’s work permit post-service process, resulting in an extra two weeks of work levy payment.

This was the final straw. To anyone considering Gladys Care, we strongly advise against it. Our experience, from the initial delay to the unprofessional and rude behavior of Gladys, was a nightmare. Even the nanny herself was shocked at the way the agent handled the situation.

For anyone looking for a confinement nanny, avoid Gladys Care / Gladys Yip at all costs. The stress and unprofessionalism are not worth it.

PS: This is only a brief description of the events. The intention of this post is merely to prevent other parents to be from encountering a similar ordeal. The reply to this review is twisted FYI. Engage at your own risk.  :)

I am extremely grateful for the support and guidance I received from Gladys. As a new mom, I struggled with breastfeeding and felt frustrated and worried that I wasn't producing enough milk for my baby. In desperation, I texted Gladys in the middle of the night, and she kindly visited me the next day.

Gladys is a compassionate and knowledgeable lactation consultant. My milk ducts were clogged and needed a boost to kick-start production, and Gladys' TCM massages effectively activated them. Thanks to Gladys, I was able to establish a successful breastfeeding experience.

After completing the TCM sessions, my milk flow improved significantly, making breastfeeding and pumping faster and more efficient. My supply also increased, allowing me to fulfill my baby's needs.

I highly recommend Gladys to any mom seeking lactation support. Her dedication, expertise, and kindness are exceptional, and I feel fortunate to have had her by my side throughout my breastfeeding journey. For those who are struggling , with the right support, any mom can overcome challenges and successfully breastfeed. Good luck mommas and Thank you Gladys! 😊

Engaged Gladys for my TCM Lactation massage. I had low supply post my one week fever. Gladys had identified the clogged ducts issue and after the massage from Gladys, the supply is coming back. Gladys also gives very good recommendations on food boosters like papaya soup and she takes the effort to help mummies in need! Thank you Gladys!

I recently delivered my child a few weeks earlier than the EDD due to certain complications which I was having. As such, I was worried about the confinement nanny situation due to these sudden last minute developments.

However, Gladys really went out of her way to ensure that both baby & myself were fully covered & well taken care of by a nanny after coming home from the hospital.

I would also like to specially mention nanny Ming Zhu as she has been cooking delicious meals for both my husband & myself.
Her attention to noticing our baby's details has been very assuring to us as well.

Gladys' post-natal massages have indeed  been very reliving & effective in reducing the post-pregnancy water retention/bloating. Would highly recommend choosing Gladys Care to all new mums/mums-to-be!

We feel very lucky to have found Gladys and to be assigned a wonderful nanny for our baby. She’s a loving and kindly presence in our family and provided excellent care with incredible patience. Gladys also takes good care of her staff, ensuring their wellness while they take care of our little one. It had a profound impact on our baby’s development. The nanny was the first to point out our baby loved to smile, and he could even wave goodbye hesitantly by watching her. As we approach the last few days of our engagement with this nanny, she has been sharing tips on how to take care of the baby for the next few months to come, which we so appreciate. We would be so fortunate if we could have the same nanny for our next child, if that happens. Thanks again Gladys for being by our side on this exciting journey!

She came in and saved the day on new years day. I was very desperate as i had engorgement issues with a lump at my armpit area. It had lasted a few days already and no matter what home remedy i tried, it doesnt seem to go away. With a few sessions with gladys, the issue was solved as promised. She also recommended me a few tips here and there and was very encouraging. No gimmicks at all, It really works

poor experience with the nannies from this agency. Although the agent was responsive and tried to salvage the situation, the quality of the nannies are really poor.

First nanny - obsessed with her phone (did not turn off notification sounds), did not burp baby sufficiently resulting in frequent vomiting, used phone while taking care of baby. Unhygienic practices of letting bb drink unfinished formula milk after 1-2 hours. Complained to us about her pay and helped herself to our food w/o asking.

(Add on a point on the vomiting, apart from over-feeding that resulted in frequent vomiting (projectile vomit, not spitting milk), it was established that the nanny didn’t burp the baby sufficiently which resulted in baby vomiting in her sleep. Now, this is dangerous. The vomiting part is still manageable. Vomiting in sleep is not acceptable!)

Replacement nanny - not trained in confinement (machiam like housewife). cannot wash anything clean (milk bottles were oily after she washed). cooked about less than 1l of red dates tea for me initially and had to tell her to cook more. prepare herbal bath one time and use for 2 days (the herbal water kept till smelly). Complained about us over the phone and kena caught because we could hear from baby monitor. Food was the same everyday, tasteless sometimes and very repetitive. She cooks the same few veggie, chicken and rarely fish. Husband asked her what fish to buy she told us to ask the fish monger. Dismissed her finally because she gave bb formula milk every hour during the night shift because she didn't know why baby was crying and kept feeding bb milk.

Both nannies do not know how to update logs - time, amount of feeding, time of poop etc.

These are just some of the issues highlighted. Overall, the quality of the 2 nannies provided to me are poor, not professional and do not appear to be well trained. Really regretted taking this agency.

Nanny Summer stayed with us for more than a month and during that time took the best care of me and my baby. Thanks to her I was able to stay well rested and recover during my confinement.❤️ So glad I decided to go with Gladys, she was very approachable and offered a personal touch as she always available for any queries, consultations and advice. Would highly recommend Gladys Care to anyone who’s looking for a confinement nanny. ❤️

We engaged nanny Meng Choo through Gladys, and she has been a great support in caring for baby. She is experienced, knows how to handle baby well, a good cook and goes out of her way to help out.

Also engaged Gladys for lactation massages and it has been effective in resolving engorgement issues.

Background:
We hired nanny Jenny from Gladys agency for our first born baby. As we had no experience with baby care at all. We have a European background and the Asian confinement services were new to use.

Experience: outstanding/ superb (🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 5/5)
When returning home from the hospital, where my breastfeeding journey did not wanted to start properly, with our firstborn whom we did not knew yet (or fully understood): we arrived home and nanny Jenny was there! Immediately helping out and teaching us everything (as we are quite hands on parents we enjoyed being involved). Nanny Jenny has been our superhero throughout the journey! She has taught us everything about baby care, sleeping, soothing, bathing, feeding, caring, day and night routine, baby gym and so much more.

Nanny Jenny is very proactive, hands-on, solution oriented. When she noticed our baby struggled with Jaundice, our baby had sunbathing moments. When she noticed a blocked nose, it was immediately resolved. When our baby was a little older and he had long nails, she cut them. When our baby had cramps, nanny Jenny knew what to do. And there are many more examples.

Nanny Jenny has set us up for success with our firstborn. Because of her, we felt confident to take care of our baby, we felt we knew our baby, we understood his different cries and we had created a good baby routine. This would not have been possible without her.

Aside from that, nanny Jenny has helped me enormously in the breastfeeding journey. It was a painful journey and I would have stopped already without her. However, she knew all tips and tricks to make it more comfortable, to have less pain, to better latch the baby, to prevent bleeding nipples etc. And I am very thankful to her. As breastfeeding is a special intimate moment between mother and child!

Nanny Jenny is a very genuine, warm hearted, fun person. Aside from her 10+ experience in the baby care / confinement industry, she is also a wonderful person to have in your house.

Last but not least, Gladys services have been excellent. Aside from the nanny services, I went for belly wrapping massage and it made a big difference! During the massage, Gladys noticed my low blood pressure and recommended me a specific TCM tea. Which she bought for me and brought along to the next massage. This customized treatment is superb! Also I had a lactation massage, which has been such a relief ever since. Before of the massage my breasts were quite hard with a lot of knobs, and after the massage the milk is flowing with any hard knobs in there. Gladys has outstanding knowledge and really knows what she is doing!!

Thank you so much for everything!! I will contact you for my second child 🥰

Nanny Julie stayed with us for two months. She’s very professional and experienced, very open to our suggestions. She never argues with us and always incorporates our requests into her routine. Julie is also very attentive and patient with the baby. She goes out of her way to make sure baby is always healthy and comfortable.
In the baby’s second month, he stayed up all night and slept sporadically in the day. Julie stayed up carrying baby all night despite being very tired, and used various methods to ensure that she was alert.
In two short months, Julie has become a part of our family. She gets along with everyone, including my mother in law and my helper. She is a joy and I strongly recommend her.

Mrs Wong from the agency was also really good to work with. She was flexible and understanding. Really happy that I found this agency.

I found Gladys Care while searching for confinement nannies for daytime confinement help. I needed someone available within the week and while I was apprehensive about approaching another agency and trying to find a reliable nanny, I am glad I went ahead with Gladys. She was very responsive and put me with Nanny Yuzhu who really was a godsend for the family. She helped me tie over the second month with the newborn and 2 other young kids as I didn't get the rest I needed with the previous nanny from another agency.

Nanny yuzhu was very patient with the baby and proactive with the chores and setting up a good routine in the house. I have learnt much from watching how she handles the different things needed to be done in a typical day and am implementing it in my own routine now that she has left.

Gladys also followed up regularly during the 28 days, checking in to make sure everything was OK. Highly recommend!

Nanny Chin is a great nanny, she is taking care of our baby like her granddaughter.
She handles baby patiently and gives massage to our baby when she gets fussy due to gassy in her stomach.

The meals prepared by her are yummy. She also prepared home cooked desserts.
Overall, we appreciate Nanny Chin for her service and assistance.

I also engaged with Gladys for lactation and postnatal massages.

I’m extremely happy with the lactation massage as I was struggled with breastfeeding with my first child. After few massage sessions, Gladys managed to clear the blocked ducts problems with the acupressure technique.

With the postnatal massage, Gladys helped to rectify my water retention I was having on my legs.
Thank you so much Gladys!

I would highly recommend Gladys Care for their service 😊

It was a pleasure experience to engage Gladys for my confinement. Many thanks to auntie Summer for the incredible support and care she has provided to our family during the confinement period. Her kindness, patience, and expertise have been invaluable, easing our worries and helping us navigate the challenges of newborn care with confidence. Not only that she had taken good care of our baby, she also had shown her love and care to me, served me delicious confinement food with customisation and variety. She speaks both Chinese and English very well. We enjoyed her accompany a lot and we will recommend her to anyone who needs a confinement nanny.

I have engaged Nanny Chan for my twins for 2 months. I can never imagined one can manage 2 babies at the same time, but Nanny Chan could do it. On top of that, she still can cook 3 confinement meals and prepare my herbal bath daily. She plans her work and manages her time very well. She is a bubbly person and always talk to the babies, engaging them in their different activities like showering and milk feeding. She is also a very clean person and ensure my babies are clean at all times. Nanny Chan gave me a peace of mind and allows me to rest well. I’m very blessed to have her for my confinement.

I have continued to engage Gladys for my baby 3rd month. They have arranged Nanny Amy. Nanny Amy takes care of my twins very well too. She trained my babies to sleep longer which allow me to have more rest time. She sings and plays with my babies when they are awake. She is very knowledgeable in taking care of babies and can cook a variety of food! She could cook not just Chinese food, and also Western food, making my meals not so boring. I’m very grateful for Nanny Amy stay with me.

Engaged Gladys for antenatal classes to learn "caring for a newborn" and also lactation techniques. Her classes were very informative, memorable and as others have also said had a personal touch to it. I enjoyed the classes very much and feel better prepared now! Would highly recommend
Nanny Sharon helped us with good cooking. Thank you.

I am very happy with the nanny assigned from Gladys Care 1987. She is very dedicated and caring towards the baby and has been very patient in teaching me how to take care of the baby as a FTM. I would highly recommend my nanny, Yu Zhu, she has been a godsend and my confinement would not have gone so smoothly without her.

Additionally, I engaged Gladys Care for their Javanese Postnatal and Lactation Engorgement massage. I felt immensely relieved that I did not have to worry about mastitis when I came back from the hospital. After a few sessions of the massages, I have slimmed back to my pre-pregnancy weight and no longer have to worry about engorgement issues.
Clean facilities, engaging for children, would recommend!

As a working parent, it’s such a relief to know my child is in good hands. The team at Ilham Childcare makes drop-offs easy, and I always feel confident my child is well taken care of throughout the day.

The facilities at Ilham Childcare are clean, well-maintained, and child-friendly. The team does an excellent job ensuring safety and hygiene, which gives me peace of mind every day.

I appreciate how Ilham Childcare incorporates cultural and moral values into their teaching. It’s wonderful to see my son learning about respect, kindness, and responsibility while having fun.

It would be great to have more parent-involvement activities, like open houses or family days. These events could help build a stronger connection between families and the childcare team. ☺️

A very clean and safe environment for childrens. The staff are caring , professional and very attentive to the childrens needs.The activities are engaging and educational, and the caregivers genuinely nurture each child’s growth and confidence. Thank you for providing such a safe and fun environment!
My sister enjoys going to ilhamchildcare & the teachers are friendly, easy to seek help from. Really Recommend others to place their child in here!
All of the teachers are very friendly & Polite!
Great place for kids

Highly recommend Ilham Childcare (North)! The teachers are really dedicated and warm, and take the effort to know each child individually. My child looks forward to going to school everyday because she gets to be herself at school - and the teachers support each child for their strengths and weaknesses.

The teachers are also open to provide feedback on children, and will work with parents to help children develop (e.g. stop using pacifiers).

Parent engagement is also good, parents and families are invited to the Centre for key events like Hari Raya, Mothers’/Fathers’ Day to celebrate with the children.

The other non-teaching staff are also very friendly and are caring towards the children. Meals served are healthy and of good variety as well.

If you want your children in good and trusted hands, this might be the place for you!

Dear Ms Jessica Teo and Esteemed Educators of Greenland Childcare Punggol,

I wanted to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude and appreciation for the exceptional dedication, patience, and care you show each and every day towards my son , Muhammad Zuhair from K2 Gracious.

As a parent, I’ve seen firsthand the positive impact your guidance and support have had on my son since he joined the school from Playgroup until now. There's a lot of improvements shown in my son from academically & mannerism.

From the thoughtful lessons to the encouraging words and the safe, nurturing environment you've created, it’s clear that this is more than just a school—it's a community built on commitment and compassion.

Thank you for not only educating minds but also inspiring hearts. Your work shapes the future in ways words can hardly capture.

Please know that your efforts do not go unnoticed and are deeply valued by our family.

With sincere thanks,
Zakiyah
Zuhair's mummy from K2 Gracious

Well rounded curriculum that was able to prep my child well for Primary 1. Appreciate that there is also a dedicated phonics teacher during curriculum time. Teachers are responsible and caring, led by a very capable principal, Ms Jessica. Would strongly recommend Greenland Childcare @ Punggol Drive!

I highly recommend this childcare centre. Both the principal and teachers are responsible and dedicated, consistently providing feedback on each child's progress and collaborating with parents to enhance the children's well-being. The centre offers additional curricula for parents to choose from. Its location is easily accessible and sheltered, making it very convenient.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
As a first-time parent, I was so nervous about leaving my baby in someone else's care, but I couldn't be happier with our decision to enroll at this infant care center. The teachers are absolute angels—they're incredibly caring and professional, and it's clear they love what they do. The facility itself is spotless, bright, and so well-equipped, and I have complete peace of mind knowing my little one is in such a safe environment. With a fantastic 1:3 teacher-to-baby ratio, I know my child is getting all the personal attention they need to thrive.
The communication from the teachers is simply outstanding. They use an app that provides real-time updates on everything—from feeding and diaper changes to nap schedules. It’s so reassuring to get those notifications throughout the day. Plus, they always share photos of all the fun activities! We get to see our baby enjoying tummy time, playing with new toys, and interacting with their friends. It's truly a highlight of our day to see those little snapshots.
This center goes above and beyond to make every day special. They plan daily activities that are both fun and enriching, and they do an amazing job of organizing special cultural celebrations and holiday events. Getting those adorable photos of our baby in their holiday outfit is just the sweetest thing! This center is more than just a daycare; it's a supportive, loving community, and we couldn't be more grateful for the incredible care our baby receives.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
Transferred to Sunny Bunny from a lower cost pre-school. After 1 year, I can see my daughter’s overall improvement, especially in Chinese.

The teachers are great and communication is smooth, in person and via the app. Specifically, I’m impressed by their explanation on why my K1 can read the schools’s material confidently but not books in general, yet.

Monthly excursions, water play and rooftop playground add to the experience.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
We’ve had a wonderful experience with Sunny Bunny Montessori Infant Care :) It’s truly a great school with a warm and caring environment. The teachers are always smiling and genuinely attentive, which gave us so much peace of mind as parents.

One thing I really appreciated was how frequently they updated us with photos and little notes, those small gestures made a big difference. The two Principals are also very friendly and approachable, which made communication smooth and easy.

It’s with a heavy heart that we had to transfer our son to another centre due to personal reasons. We’ll definitely miss the Sunny Bunny family, and we’re so grateful for the love and care they’ve given. ❤️

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
We love Sunny Bunny Montessori! Excellent school with 1) strong Chinese curriculum 2) Outdoor playground (everyday!!!) 3) excellent teachers like teacher Maria, teacher Chavelle, 胡老师, 林老师 and many more teachers with long tenure and heart for the children 4) Montessori teaching which is 1 to 1 and helps the kids learn faster 5) very clean nice environment - our kid hardly falls ill.

My daughter didn't speak much when she joined at 18 months but now she can recognise Chinese characters and speak aplenty! We don't send her for any outside enrichment at all as Sunny Bunny has met all our needs! Best choice we've made for our little one's education! I hear that they now have infant care!

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text: We enrolled our 18m daughter in Sunny Bunny 4 months ago and we’ve had a great experience with the school! The teachers are extremely warm and caring and genuinely love and care for our daughter. They are very happy to see her every morning and make her feel very welcome. She managed to stay in school for a full day on her first day and cried for less than a week - we believe this is testament to how the teachers have helped her settle into a completely new environment. We get very regular updates (and even photos of her eating and napping everyday). Teachers even specifically update us on what food she enjoys in particular in school so that we can offer it to her at home. She looks forward to going to school even on weekends and will try to put on her uniform. We also observed first hand how the teachers care for the children on excursions and how much the children love their teachers. Thank you teachers! She has also learnt a lot since she started school and is surprisingly proficient in Mandarin! We would highly recommend Sunny Bunny to anyone who is looking for a preschool :)

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
My son transferred to Sunny Bunny 2 months ago, from a branded preschool. His change so far is impressing and very positive.

In the previous school he was reluctant to attend school and always asked us to pick him up on time. Now he is actually asking us to come later so that he can play more with his friends and teachers at school! I am so impressed by the kindness, and the bright smiles among all the teachers. No wonder my kid would like to stay at school.

That being said, it is not just the calm and happiness this school brings to my kid, but also I can see his enthusiasm in study is back, and continuously growing. His reading capability in both Chinese and English makes great progress, he now can entertain himself alone with his books! ( thank god, it gives me and my husband some quiet time😂)

Overall Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool is  good but underrecognized, it deserves more reputation.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text: I enrolled my Grandson in Sunny Bunny . He started 1 week ago, at 18 months old as I was impressed by the school's holistic curriculum and Montessori approach. He took less than a week to adapt to school thanks to very caring teachers . Sunny Bunny have private playground. All small Classes, therefore teachers able attend to every kids.  This is the best Montessori school I've seen so far.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
We transferred our 3 yr old son to Sunny Bunny from another childcare very recently. So far we have been very pleased with this transition and his progress in Chinese.

It was a very painful decision to transfer our son to a new center but we wanted our boy to have a better grasp of the Chinese language as our family is primary English speaking. So far we are glad that we made the right choice.

Teacher Maria and Teacher Hu has gone above and beyond to welcome our boy from day one. The owner of the centre (Hui Ling) whose children are also attending the centre was very reassuring to us as parents as well.

The school has a great outdoor and indoor play area very suitable for kid's physical activities. They also have a in house cook that prepares meals for the kids. Our boy has put on a bit of weight since he join Sunny Bunny.

Keep it up, Sunny Bunny! We are delighted to join this lovely community.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
I wanted to share our positive experience with Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool, especially for our son. He has been attending the school for the past four months, and we have noticed tremendous growth and development during this time.

Firstly, my son has adapted exceptionally well to the school environment within just two weeks. It's been heartwarming to witness his enthusiasm for going to school every day. He has even started sharing the names of his teachers with us, including TR Maria, Hu Lao Shi, Chen Lao Shi, and Aunty Kim. This shows that he has built a good rapport with the teachers and feels comfortable in their presence.

One thing that sets Sunny Bunny Montessori apart from other preschools we considered is the evident love and care provided by the teachers. The atmosphere at the school radiates warmth and positivity, making it a nurturing environment for children. It's reassuring as parents to know that our child is in such capable hands.

The school's curriculum and activities have also contributed to our son's growth. Through the pictures and videos shared on the school's application, we can see that he has daily playground sessions and afternoon language sessions, where he is exposed to Mandarin. It's truly impressive that he is already able to speak some Mandarin sentences.

My son's love for the school extends beyond the classroom. He often recites the songs he learns at school, especially the phonics songs, when he's at home and even before going to sleep. This demonstrates the positive impact the school's teachings have on his learning and enjoyment.

Lastly, we appreciate the monthly field trips organized by the school, which allow us as parents to tag along. These outings not only provide an opportunity for us to bond with Davian but also help us feel more involved in his preschool experience.

Overall, we are extremely pleased with Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool. The supportive teachers, engaging curriculum, and the sense of community make it a fantastic learning environment for our son. We highly recommend the school to other parents seeking a nurturing and holistic preschool for their children.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
Very good pre-school from which my 5 kids graduated. This shows how consistent the school has been through the years in their quality of curriculum and educators. The school has a knack for hiring teachers with golden hearts- who truly care for the kids and desire the best for them. They stretch the kids but at the same time, their well-being comes first. The teachers genuinely love the kids and take pride in watching them progress through the years. It is a rare find- a gem of a school. Fees are high though not much higher than many private centres. With the strong curriculum, I do not need to spend extra to put my kids in enrichment centres and can spend quality time w them on precious weekends. And because of the excellent care, SBM has given me a peace of mind to know my kids are in very good hands which in priceless for a working mother.
Highly recommend.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
Sending our 3-year-old son to Sunny Bunny Preschool has been one of the best decisions we've made as parents. The school's environment is nurturing, engaging, and designed to foster creativity and curiosity in young minds. The school team is incredibly supportive and attentive to each child's needs, ensuring a personalized learning experience.

What sets Sunny Bunny Preschool apart is its holistic approach to early childhood education. The curriculum is thoughtfully designed to balance academic learning with essential life skills, promoting social, emotional, and intellectual development. Our son has shown remarkable progress in his communication abilities, social interactions, and problem-solving skills.

Moreover, the school places a strong emphasis on parent-teacher communication, keeping us informed and involved in our child's learning journey!

Would highly recommend parents to consider Sunny Bunny Preschool as their child's early education!

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
Sunny Bunny Montessori deserves 5 star good review. My son has been in the school for 2 months now and he is adjusting to school very well. He looks forward to going to school everyday and so far he didn’t get sick. Compared to the previous franchised pre school that we sent him to, he go sick every two weeks in the previous school and we were unable to send him for full day curriculum.

Sunny Bunny Montessori has very strong academic curriculum as well. My son develops cognitive and language skills quickly from the school curriculum. He can even recognise Chinese characters and enjoys reading. He develops good habits that he finds books to read on his own. He enjoys singing the songs learned from school and showcased to us when gets back home.

I can tell that the teachers are truly caring and my son loves all the teachers. He will repeat saying teacher Maria, chen laoshi, hu laoshi, teach Lindy at home.

The school also organises monthly excursion trips and my son also enjoys going to it. This creates valuable bonding time between the children and parents. The teachers also planned the itinerary very well, full of fun and something to take away.

I have been recommending the school to my friends though it is not a franchised school and very few people know about it. It is no doubt a hidden gem school which deserves all the 5 star reviews!

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
Our daughter went to Sunny Bunny when she was only 18 months old. At first, we were quite worried about whether she could adapt. It was during COVID then, and we seldom brought her out, so she became very attached to us so much so that when she goes to somewhere unfamiliar, she would became very nervous. But surprisingly, she adapted to life in Sunny Bunny very quickly and very well! Only a few weeks in, we could tell that she became more outgoing, more confident and more sociable. After 2 months when she was about 20 months old, we were confident enough to allow her to take the school bus on her own, and she enjoyed it very much. It was such a relief for us and we are very grateful to the school.

The teachers in Sunny Bunny are very caring. Special thanks to Teacher Maria and Chen Laoshi!! They're very patient, and attend to every child's individual needs. One of the many examples - Because my daughter usually takes a long time to finish her meals, Teacher Maria and Chen Laoshi would specially prepared small bite-sized apple cubes for my daughter. They would mix it into the rice, to encourage my daughter to chew more. They would  also always try to make sure that she finishes her food.

The overall environment in Sunny Bunny is very warm and welcoming. Thanks to the Montessori method, my daughter is familiar with all teachers and students in the school. She likes to take care of the younger ones and newer ones in school, just like how she had been taken care of when she first went to the school. She has a lot of friends in the school, and she even knows all their siblings by name as well!

Academic wise, Sunny Bunny is very strong, especially in the Chinese language. We were very pleased to see that my daughter was able to recognize a whole stack of Chinese characters, and able to read when she was 3 yo. There are other enrichment classes embedded into the curriculum, like Ping Pong class, Robotics, gym class, and these are all my daughter's favourites.

I would recommend Sunny Bunny to any parent who want their children to be in a caring school with strong academics and a fun curriculum.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
Sent my 5 children to Sunny Bunny Montessori, with my youngest enrolled and having a fantastic time there. She adjusted to the environment very smoothly on the first day, all thanks to the nurturing teachers and environment. No crying and separation anxiety at all.

For parents still contemplating whether to enrol, this childcare centre is indeed a good choice. I had past experiences enrolling my 2 older ones in a branded childcare centre with many branches (many franchised) but had withdrawn them to join Sunny Bunny Montessori. When assessing a childcare centre, understanding the management’s commitment to taking care of staff and children’s needs is crucial. I am thankful to have come across Sunny Bunny and have a peace of mind at work.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
We’re so happy and glad to send our girl to Sunny Bunny Montessori. We regret never send her earlier when we tour the school when she was 3yrs old. We sent her to other childcare and she never show any enthusiasm nor learning anything.

Ever-since she joined Sunny Bunny Montessori, everyday she is looking forward to go school and every night she too excited to sleep.

Besides that, she also improving on her life skills such as button her own clothing, eating meal by herself. Her motor skills improved as well by doing a lot of outdoor gym and indoor ping pong and rock climbing.

The most surprising is that her Chinese from she doesn’t know how to speak and now she can even pronounce difficult chinese words and read in sentence and paragraph within a month.

And we also witness she dare to kick off diaper wit the encouragements from her loving teachers.

We really grateful and appreciate to the warm, loving and patience Teacher Nayak, Li Lao Shi and Ms Ang. Beyond words to express how we feel, we really so glad that our girl is part of Sunny Bunny Montessori Family.

Love XoXo 😘: Chua Family

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text: I send my daughter to Chinese class here on the weekends and she loves her laoshi and enjoys going for class. Her vocab has also improved which is an added benefit but seeing her look forward to going to Sunny bunny on Saturdays is what makes me love the school.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text: Very clean and kids friendly place. The Teachers taking good care of the kids and alot of montessori toys for kids

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
I send my 3 kids (2 boys and 1 girl) aged 2 years apart to Sunny Bunny Montessori since 2017. Most importantly, my kids received excellent preschool education with dedicated teachers & excellent facilities, especially with the Montessori way of imparting knowledge.

My eldest boy has special needs, and Sunny Bunny was able to conduct some early intervention techniques. I guess that is the wonder of the Montessori way.

Another aspect of Sunny Bunny is the Mandarin curriculum. Simply amazing. Every child is guaranteed to recognise 4000 Mandarin characters before entering Primary school. Their exposure to Mandarin at such a young age and ability to read Mandarin characters was astounding to me.

Sunny Bunny has robotics (they send teams to participate in the annual robotics competition), gym classes, table tennis, Mathematics, Mandarin, English ALL in the curriculum, and year end, the children are exposed to preparing for the annual year end concert cum graduation.

The toys/equipment used for the lessons are top notch. Even during the Covid years when HBL was implemented, all the teachers at Sunny Bunny conducted full day lessons everyday through HBL. There were no making up of excuses to close down the centre for a few days just because of Covid.

Now that my kids have graduated from Sunny Bunny, I feel almost sad that my kids have left an golden era of being so well-taken care of at Sunny Bunny. A lot of the children who graduated from SB all managed to enter top tier primary schools and achieved getting awards.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text: Love the school’s facilities and its truly montessori environment. The teacher is also very experienced and loving, patient towards kid. Special thanks to teacher Maria and Chen laoshi who took care of my kid and helping her to settle in the school nicely. I enjoy seeing my baby happily going to school everyday and learn new skills, new words. The ratio is also lower than normal so she rarely get sick from school.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
Since they are moving to a new location, they were selling some of their materials, I managed to snag some of them, very high quality materials in extremely good condition. Had a look around the school and was amazed at the extensive materials they offer. They had shelves filled with many musical instruments and large drum sets as well, which is uncommon for neighbourhood montessori schools. Also saw some shelves with daily montessori activities, and even a room for baby montessori.

Excited to see how their new place is going to be. Highly recommend.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text: Sunny Bunny Montessori offers a nurturing environment for young learners in Singapore. With a dedicated staff and well-designed Montessori curriculum, the kindergarten emphasizes holistic development. The facility is clean, secure, and equipped with engaging learning materials. We appreciate the personalized attention our kid receive, fostering a positive early educational experience. I’ll recommend if you are looking for a quality preschool.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio

Along with that the teachers are very friendly towards my kids and they update us on the children’s development progress very frequently. Overall highly recommend the school to any parents.

Oh btw, they are moving to Ang Mo Kio next year as well

text: The teachers are helpful and passionate. Class size is just nice. Facilities tip top

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text: I enrolled my daughter in Sunny Bunny when she was 18 months old as I was impressed by the school's holistic curriculum and montessori approach. She took less than a week to adapt to school thanks to very caring teachers and she is able to recognise letters and numbers in her first month of school. She is also enjoying school. Very impressed by the school and I've to say the travelling is worth it. The best montessori school I've seen so far.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text: My wife and I went to Sunny Bunny’s year end open house to view the place as we are looking around for a play group for our son. The space was huge, ideal for kids to move about. Was also impressed with the teachers’ knowledge on the Montessori curriculum which I am  interested in. Also a plus for me to know that there are school bus services which will make travelling easier. Definitely one of my top few choices as I continue to look for a play group for my son.

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio
text:
Visited Sunny Bunny Montessori's Open House on 17 Dec 2022.

We were invited to freely explore the premise where there were many areas and rooms for different purposes. We were amazed when we went into the kids gym room where we saw a few of their preschoolers practising their the table tennis skills like a pro and we had no doubts that they can even compete with adults.

The teachers also introduced us to their vast range of learning materials (i.e. playcards, beads, wood blocks, bowls with pasta etc) which they use in their everyday curriculum to teach the kids on mathematics, language and even practical life skills.

As a new parent, it was an true eye-opener for us to see how different this preschool is compared to normal neighbourhood preschools. I believe the kids enrolled into this preschool will be moulded into elites with a promising future!

company_name: Sunny Bunny Montessori Preschool at Ang Mo Kio

These programs create a nurturing and supportive environment where students can thrive, feel safe, and build confidence. provide academic support, helping students with homework

From the moment we started, the staff demonstrated a remarkable level of professionalism and dedication. The individualized attention given to each student is impressive; they truly understand and cater to the unique needs of every child. The educational and emotional support provided has made a significant positive impact on my child's development and overall well-being. The environment is nurturing and encouraging, which fosters both academic and personal growth. I highly recommend [Service Name] to any parent looking for top-notch care and support for their child's education and development. It has been an invaluable experience for us!

Dedicated Student Care is a truly commendable service that offers comprehensive support for students navigating their academic journey. The care provided is both holistic and personalized, ensuring that each student’s unique needs are met.

The standout feature of Dedicated Student Care is its focus on individualized attention. Whether a student needs help with academic challenges, mental health support, or guidance on career choices, the program is well-equipped to offer relevant assistance. The staff members are not only knowledgeable but also genuinely invested in the well-being and success of the students. They take the time to understand each student's situation, offering tailored advice and resources that can make a real difference.

Moreover, the accessibility of the services is another major plus. Whether through scheduled appointments, drop-in hours, or online support, students have multiple ways to seek help. This flexibility ensures that students can receive the support they need without adding extra stress to their already busy schedules.

The integration of mental health support within the Dedicated Student Care program is also noteworthy. In an era where student stress and anxiety are at an all-time high, having access to qualified counselors and mental health resources is invaluable. The program doesn't just focus on academic success but also prioritizes the overall well-being of the students.

In terms of areas for improvement, expanding the range of services to include more specialized academic tutoring or workshops on specific skills could enhance the program even further. Additionally, increasing awareness among students about the full scope of services available could ensure that more students take advantage of the support offered.

Overall, Dedicated Student Care is a vital resource for students, providing them with the tools, support, and guidance they need to thrive both academically and personally. The commitment to student well-being is evident, making it a crucial part of the student experience.

A strong foundation in language begins early in a child’s life, and as an educator, I firmly believe that parent workshops are a powerful way to nurture meaningful home-school learning connections. This is my third MRW workshop at MindChamps, and I am truly heartened by the genuine interest our parents show in their Champs' learning journey. Their enthusiasm and eagerness to be involved are not only encouraging but also play a vital role in building confident, capable and joyful learners.
Great workshop to understand our champs 😊

Recently enrolled to MindChamps Punggol. It's a great school with good facilities, nice and engaging teachers, condusive environment for learning.

They also frequently conduct workshops to let parents know what they are learning at school and how we are able to support them at home.

I had a very positive experience attending the recent MRW workshop organized by the school. The workshop was incredibly helpful in giving us, as parents, a clearer understanding of how teachers conduct lessons in class and what our children are currently learning. It also provided practical tips on how we can support our child’s learning at home.

I would like to especially commend Ms Katherine for her patience and dedication. She took the time to guide us through the online learning platform and shared valuable suggestions on how to help our children at home. I also truly appreciate the effort she made to show my child’s learning video in class, which I believe has boosted her confidence greatly.

This experience reminded me of the importance of revising the content at home with our children. Reinforcing what they’ve learned in school not only strengthens their understanding but also builds a strong foundation for their continued learning journey.

上周五参加了学校组织的MRW workshop，在会议中Ms Katherine 给讲解了不同年级需要阅读那些绘本、阅读顺序（从左到右）、字母发音、单词拼写、高频词汇以及编写句子等，告诉家长在家可以通过游戏方式来和孩子一起学习单词，整个会议过程都很有趣，因为我家孩子是刚入园没有多久，K1的内容需要跟上，N2的内容也需要补上。会议后还向Ms Katherine 老师提出了自己孩子的知识弱点，Ms Katherine 老师特别耐心的解答并给提出宝贵意见。这次我们算是收获满满，接下来在家庭互动中准备实践一下，特别是通过游戏方式，特别感谢学校组织的MRW workshop，也特别感谢Ms Katherine 老师的耐心讲解。

上星期刚上了MCM workshop, Jerome 老师生动有趣的讲解让我们身为家长的对小冠军在学校的学习有更多一层的了解。也让我们知道我们如何在家里可以帮助小冠军练习👍
今天亲子活动好好玩，增进我们的感情。谢谢老师们的热情支持这个活动。很有意义。

With principals who love children and education, plus a great team who share the same passion, we believe we will have many more memorable moments for our girl's pre-school journey with MindChamps Punggol.
